description: Tests system's ability to handle very long messages with multiple intelligence points spread throughout. Validates extraction from lengthy paragraphs and proper UI scrolling.

turns.scammer_message: Hello sir/madam, I am Prakash Mehta from Elite Investment Solutions. We have an exclusive opportunity for high-return investment in government bonds. This is a limited time offer available only to select customers like you. The returns are guaranteed by Reserve Bank of India and you can earn up to 25% returns in just 3 months. Many of our existing clients have already benefited from this scheme. To get started, you need to make an initial investment of minimum Rs.10,000. For any queries, you can reach me at 9123456789 or email prakash.elite@investments.com. Our office is located in Mumbai financial district.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Phone(s), 1 Name(s), 2 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: hello prakash beta... i am pushpa verma... i am a retired teacher from delhi... my son usually helps me with money things but he is in bangalore... this scheme sounds very good for my pension savings... 10000 is ok for me... but how do i send it? do i have to go to bank or can i send from phone? i am not very good with teh mobile... pls tell me where to send teh money beta

turns.scammer_message: Let me explain the process in detail so you understand how safe and profitable this is. First, you need to transfer your investment amount to our secure collection account. The account details are: Bank Name - HDFC Bank, Account Number - 50200987654321, IFSC Code - HDFC0001357, Account Holder Name - Prakash Kumar Mehta. Once we receive your payment, our team will process your investment application within 24 hours. You will receive official investment certificates via courier to your registered address. The interest will be credited monthly to your account. You can also refer your friends and family and earn additional 5% referral bonus. Our company is registered with SEBI and has been operating since 2018. We have helped over 5000 investors across India.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: prakash beta i am trying to put the details in my phone but my eyes are very weak and i am scared i will type wrong bank number... do u have any upi id? my son says upi is very easy for old people and i dont have to type so many numbers... what name will show on teh screen if i use upi? i want to be sure it is going to you only beta before i press send

turns.scammer_message: I understand you might have concerns about online investments, which is completely natural in today's world. That's why we offer multiple verification methods. You can visit our website at elite-invest.secure-bonds.in/register to see testimonials from our satisfied clients. We also have a WhatsApp business number 9876543210 where you can chat with our customer support team. For immediate investment processing, you can also use UPI payment which is faster. Our UPI ID is prakash.elite@paytm or elite.investments@ybl. The minimum investment remains Rs.10,000 but if you invest Rs.50,000 or more today, you will get an extra 2% bonus return. This bonus offer expires in 24 hours so I recommend acting quickly. You can also reach my colleague Rajesh Singh at 8899776655 if you need any clarification about the scheme details.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 2 UPI ID(s), 3 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 WhatsApp(s), 2 Name(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am trying teh upi... i typed prakash.elite@paytm in my app... what name will show there? i want to be 100% sure before i send my pension money... and beta u gave so many numbers... which one should i call to tell u i sent teh money? my head is spinning with all these numbers
